label: Filler Phase
description: Between 2-minute burst windows (~90s of filler). Maintain the 1-2-3 combo, use tool cooldowns immediately, spend Heat on Hypercharge when tools are 8s+ away, and deploy Queen to avoid Battery overcap.

steps.reasoning: Start the 1-2-3 combo. Each combo hit generates 5 Heat. This is your primary GCD filler between tool cooldowns.
Second combo hit. 300 potency when comboed. Continue building Heat gauge toward 50 for Hypercharge.
Combo finisher — 380 potency. Generates 5 Heat and 10 Battery. The only combo hit that builds Battery.
580 potency tool on a 20s recast. Always use immediately when available. Never delay tools for Hypercharge.
580 potency, generates 20 Battery. 40s recast. Use on cooldown — tool priority is absolute.
580 potency, generates 20 Battery, grants Excavator Ready. 60s recast. Follow immediately with Excavator.
Always use directly after Chain Saw. 580 potency, generates 20 Battery. Don't let the Excavator Ready buff expire.
Deploy Queen when Battery is high to avoid overcapping (max 100). In filler, deploy at 80+ Battery. Save high Battery deploys for raid buff windows when possible.
Only enter Hypercharge when all tools (Drill, Air Anchor, Chain Saw) have 8s+ remaining on cooldown. Hypercharge locks you into 1.5s GCDs for ~8s — you cannot use tools during this window.
